entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Roberval
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -22.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Roberval Airport 03:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -22.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -28.3°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
